messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to climate change, a horde of wire eating mammals have swarmed into the [REDACTED].
